page.title: 11Law and order in Rhos
page.content: The new police station was built in 1984 in Market Street.It is easy for people to go there. In the police station there are four cells. In our school there have been about fourteen breakins. We had our school video and tapes stolen.We went to the police station on a project. The man we met was P.C.Williams(he has been in the police force 22 years) he took us around the station with Johnstown school. We asked him a few questions about the police station. Were Rhos police aloud to break the speed limit? "Only in an emergency".At the station there are two sargeants,seven constables and a girl on reception. Ten police men were based there altogether. They had four patrol cars .We asked P.C.Williams if he used his truntion."Only a few times with violent prisoners",came the reply.
